result.execSummary:
The defendant Buckley L. Cloud was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Buckley L. Cloud is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Buckley L. Cloud was found guilty of Fail/Report to County Jail (<10 Days), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.425(1m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Buckley L. Cloud

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Buckley L. Cloud in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Amended charge of misd FTR.  $443.00 costs.  Cash bond on file to be applied. State moves to amend.  Court amends the charge to 946.425(1m)(a).  Defendant agrees.  No contest plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court finds Def. guilty.  Court imposes sentence.
Count 1:
$243.00 costs and $200.00 surcharge, 60 days to pay or set up a payment plan.
$500 cash bond applied.
Paperwork handed in court.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 13, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Cover Letter from atty. Tsai
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 13, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  There is a resolution to this case to amend to misdemeanor.  DE in inpatient program.  Graduation 8/17/16.  Atty. Tsai provided letter of this.  Requests reset 30 days out.  Bond continues.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 13, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 5, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
State"s
Cover Letter from Atty. Mueller
Final pre-trial on July 25, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Jury trial on August 4, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Motion hearing 3/4/16
Final pre-trial on July 18, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Jury trial on July 25, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on March 21, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Buckley L. Cloud in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states case and State state appearances and status.  Motion to dismiss both counts of information filed by Atty Tsai.  Court notes he's reviewed the motion as well as the transcript from the prelim.  State provided no written response.  Atty Tsai states his argument as to his motion to dismiss.  State responds.  Court asks for clarification on his decision to be made today.  State responds.  Court requests clarification as to 973.15(8)(a) from Atty Tsai.  Atty Tsai responds re: "stay" of sentence.  State responds.  Atty Tsai responds.  Parties argue.  Court finds there is no basis for the failure to report to jail charge and dismisses Count 1.  Court finds DE transporting himself from Eau Claire ot Sauk County is in transitional custody.  Court denies the motion for dismissal as to Count 2.  State requests status conference be set.  Atty Tsai agrees.  Court will have status conference set w/notices to be provided.
Motion hearing at 03-04-2016 03:00 pm
Preliminary Hearing 9/4/15

Defendant Buckley L. Cloud in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Rec'd copy of INFO/waived reading.    Court enters Not Guilty plea- Set for Trial br. 1.  Bond continues.
Arraignment at 10-07-2015 01:00 pm
Exhibits 1 & 2

Defendant Buckley L. Cloud in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Sue A. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court officer R. Laatsch appears.  State calls Srgt. Ray Laatsch, SCSD.  Atty. Tsai objects, State can have JOC or doc's marked.  State marks exh. 1 & 2.  Atty. Tsai cross exam.  State redirect. Court recv'd exh. 1 & 2. State requests bind over.  Atty. Tsai makes argument, there was no stay of sentence.  State makes argument.  Court finds probable cause, bind over to br. 1.   Set over for arraignment.  Arraignment scheduled for October 7, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing at 09-04-2015 10:30 am

Defendant Buckley L. Cloud in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Recently recv'd discovery.  Request preliminary hearing.  Time limits continued waived.  Bond continues.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 4, 2015 at 10:30 am.

Pre-trial conference at 07-31-2015 08:45 am.
Return date at 08-13-2015 01:00 pm.

Defendant Buckley L. Cloud appeared by video means w/atty. Puck Tsai.  Prosecuting Atty Sue Mueller and Rick S. appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Advised rights to an attorney.  State requests $500.00 Cash bail.  Requests Preliminary hearing; Time limits waived.  $500.00 CASH bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 31, 2015 at 08:45 am.  Return date scheduled for August 13, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
